name: Black Pencil
description:
"loneliness"

In Black Pencil you are Kiyoshi. Living a normal life, only a dream has been haunting you for a long time. In it, you see the death of a young woman. You then find out that she really exists.

This title is an original ATP Projects release, published 2004-01-15. The writing, production and direction was done by mikey. The art was done by Magic_Diagram. The engine was created by Jet. Estimated completion time is 40 minues.

Black Pencil is game Nr. 1 of the Original 22.
